mapper.select: select dept_id, parent_id, ancestors, dept_name, order_num, leader, phone, email, status, del_flag, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, create_user, update_user from sys_dept where dept_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dept(dept_id, parent_id, ancestors, dept_name, order_num, leader, phone, email, status, del_flag, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, create_user, update_user) values (#{deptId}, #{parentId}, #{ancestors}, #{deptName}, #{orderNum}, #{leader}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{status}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})

insert into sys_dept(dept_id, parent_id, ancestors, dept_name, order_num, leader, phone, email, status, del_flag, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, create_user, update_user) values
(#{entity.deptId}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.ancestors}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.leader}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser})

insert into sys_dept(dept_id, parent_id, ancestors, dept_name, order_num, leader, phone, email, status, del_flag, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, create_user, update_user) values
(#{entity.deptId}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.ancestors}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.leader}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser})
on duplicate key update dept_id = values(dept_id), parent_id = values(parent_id), ancestors = values(ancestors), dept_name = values(dept_name), order_num = values(order_num), leader = values(leader), phone = values(phone), email = values(email), status = values(status), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), tenant_id = values(tenant_id), create_user = values(create_user), update_user = values(update_user)
mapper.update:
update sys_dept
parent_id = #{parentId},
ancestors = #{ancestors},
dept_name = #{deptName},
order_num = #{orderNum},
leader = #{leader},
phone = #{phone},
email = #{email},
status = #{status},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_user = #{updateUser},
where dept_id = #{deptId}
